website_summaries.verdict: Some chin strap devices can create undesired skin creases, but this wider bandage model fits much better around jawline and side of the face.
pros: Wide band does not dig into skin or leave creases
Keeps mouth closed but airways open, just like other models with more straps
cons: Does not stay secure on chin
Material can trap heat, become scratchy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different chin straps over the years and this was the worst. It is basically just a simple broad piece of elastic cloth that you run under you chin and over the top of your head, securing it with Velcro sewn into cloth. Their material costs must be very low, and even then the piece of cloth they sent was so short I had to stretch it way too tightly to make the two ends meet. Not comfortable at all. Having the cloth cover your ears made them hot, too. Unfortunately, you can not return chin straps after you've worn them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Keimer

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: You can make this tighter or looser and it is very comfortable. We put it on at least an hour every night at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne A. Matheson

customer_reviews.title: Found it to be very comfortable to wear and stays on all night
customer_reviews.text: Found it to be very comfortable to wear and stays on all night. I thought it might be too wide and I wouldn't like it covering my ears but the width helped to stabilize it and it doesn't bother my ears at all. So far it is the best one I have tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: David Hill

customer_reviews.title: This Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: This one actually works! Yes it is ugly but that not what you bought it for. Make sure it pulls the back of your tongue forward and not the chin back. The extra strap to hold in place is great. I bought another type with the ear holes an it is already stretched out and really did not work that good.
customer_reviews.author: SFam.

customer_reviews.title: Please don't make me wear this any more!
customer_reviews.text: I suppose if you really, really need this, then best of luck. For me, however, I could not STAND wearing this. If I made it tight enough to hold my chin up, it started to hurt my head on top. If it was loose enough not to hurt my head, then it wasn't tight enough to hold my chin. Simple concept, but just not working for me. Just chucked it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Pdok

customer_reviews.title: Unusable.. the part of the strap that wraps ...
customer_reviews.text: Unusable.. the part of the strap that wraps around the back of your head is tiny, and doesn't fit at all...
customer_reviews.author: Ed Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little strap, very adjustable and breathable, I easily forget I am using it at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bello

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased by my wife, and she is very happy with it. She says it is very comfortable, and helps to eliminate her snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do comfortably. I only wish that it came in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do comfortably. I only wish that it came in a smaller width so it wouldn't be touching my throat. (Note: I have a smaller face.) Since I wear it with my CPAP mask, this is a better option than the neoprene chin which would cross the back of my head, where there is already a mask strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: stayed in place on the top of my head but moved way to much around the chin area.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with my new nasal CPAP mask. I found that the strap was binding probably because I have a heavy throat. It would work well, I think, for someone of average build or smaller. I have donated it to a senior apartment through a friend; someone will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and well made also does the work
customer_reviews.author: Public

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a knock-off
customer_reviews.text: Because the paperwork came with soooo many misspelled words, I am fairly certain that this item is a knock-off. The fit was uncomfortable & it didn't stay on. It kept sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bills

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little too stretchy for my liking. I needed it to be tight and stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Holt

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap to support jaw area
customer_reviews.text: Used this after a procedure on my jaw - much better than the whole head wrap that was supplied by the doctor. As a bonus my husband said it keeps me from snoring!
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: A WASTE OF
customer_reviews.text: IT HAS BEEN MONTHS, AT FIRST IT WORKED, THEN STRETCHED OUT AND DIDN'T WORK ANYMORE. A WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: jajic

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my Mouth Shut!
customer_reviews.text: And that's a hard thing to do according to my husband. No more dry mouth and throat. Only draw back I can see is it catches on my earrings and pulls the out when I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but a bit too flexible to keep my mouth fully closed.
customer_reviews.author: Casey K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality chin strap
customer_reviews.text: This chin strap is good quality. I have used this type chin strap for years. I was happy to find this replacement on Amazon. Soft and comfortable while still providing good support.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have sleep apnea and the use of my machine caused me to have serious dry mouth problems every night. The chin strap I had been using did nothing to help. in fact, it actually, I believe, made the problem worse. This Legend chin strap solved my problem the very first time I used it and every night since. I now own three of these straps, and I plan to purchase more as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Sharaba

customer_reviews.title: Best strap FOR ME.
customer_reviews.text: I am a CPAP user. I've used this for over a year. It is comfortable, durable, and works as claimed, FOR ME. YMMV. I've tried a few other and this one works best FOR ME. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I use this strap to keep my mouth closed while I use my CPAP machine. It does a good job of keeping my mouth shut, but until you wash it two or three times it will irritate your skin where it touches bare skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tug Guy

customer_reviews.title: Legend Medical Snore Stop Strap
customer_reviews.text: My wife says it flattens her hair and refuses to use it. I can't say whether it is effective in preventing snoring since she refuses to give it a fair trial.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Willie

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Per my husband this was very uncomfortable. The band was too wide to use with his machine. We will not promote use for this strap.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Winder

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: this product doesn't work, it is a joke. No matter how tight you put it you still end up snoring through the night
customer_reviews.author: tray

customer_reviews.title: I found it cumbersome. I hade to use safety ...
customer_reviews.text: I found it cumbersome. I hade to use safety pins to hold the straps in place because they kept coming loose. Other than that it functioned as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: well made and reasonably comfortable. The two extra velcro straps help to keep it in place. no more words to say.
customer_reviews.author: C Menon

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's adjustable versus the one size fits all ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. Love that it's adjustable versus the one size fits all type. Doesn't leave a mark on your face.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kakiuchi

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: May look simple but this strap really works. Amazing velcro strength which defintely will keep your jaw where you set it.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: became frayed after a week of usage, the back strap was very short without any elastic.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not so great. The strap would not keep my jaw/mouth closed. Other than that, it felt good wearing it, but did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Juleana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This had so many bits and pieces that I couldn't make it work at all. there are several,pieces and it does not do the job of holding my mouth shut.
customer_reviews.author: jaded

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strap I've ever used. Very comfortable and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Owl74

customer_reviews.title: A bit short
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit short which, after stretching, only allowed me to partially connect the velcro ends. Otherwise, I am pleased, esp. for the price. Good value. (I never use the small extra ties that come with them).
customer_reviews.author: MALCOLM TELLOIAN

customer_reviews.title: Strong and extra long
customer_reviews.text: Came with a few days. Exactly what I needed. Soft, strong, extra wide and extra long. Velcro fastener is large and holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Seng5053

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cpap users but stretches out fast and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for cpap users but stretches out fast and slips, loosens so it does not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: First chinstrap I've tried that was snug enough to keep me from mouth-breathing all night (while on nasal pillow CPAP), but was still comfortable, given its width and the type of material.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sinner

customer_reviews.title: Medical Chin Strap
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how good it is for stopping snoring but I used it for my brother when his jaw became dislodged. After going to the ER when his jaw slipped out of place they had to put him under to get it back in place and tapped his jaw to keep him from moving it. When we got home I replaced the awful tape with this chin strap and he slept comfortable with it until morning. It is nice because it can be adjusted. It kept my brother from moving his jaw for 10 hours and he slept comfortably with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurts and does not work
customer_reviews.text: Hurts and does not work. I should have returned it but threw it across the room and forgot. I should have known it was dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who snores badly. Although the chin strap holds the mouth closed, my husband continued to snore through his nose. Wasted our money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J Takayama

customer_reviews.title: Legend Medical Stop Strap
customer_reviews.text: Stop strap really works. No more waking up with a parched mouth and tongue and no more snoring. I like it so much that I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: My previous chin strap was very comfortable and worked well
customer_reviews.text: No more creases across my face! I bought this chin strap specifically because other users said it did not leave creases in the face. I am in my 70s, and any creases made in my face will last all day long. My previous chin strap was very comfortable and worked well, but it did leave creases. Also it was pretty expensive. So I tried the Legend and it doesn't leave creases, so I am much happier with it. It is not quite as comfortable, but it isn't bad and it does keep my mouth closed at night. It stays on all night without my having to fuss with it. I like the fact that you can adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: Kayesse

customer_reviews.title: Too much quality for it's own good!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very comfortable for use with CPAP machine use. Good pricing from this particular seller also. The only negative I can see is that the Velcro on the small straps (I use just one, low around the back of my neck) which hold the large strap in place, holds so tightly that when you remove it some of the fabric on the large strap is damaged. If this could be corrected somehow, this chin strap would be perfect. It just seems to me it won't last as long because it uses Velcro that holds too tight to the main strap. A conundrum for sure! However, it is very comfortable and I highly recommend it even with this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Arly from Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Not really comfortable,but seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: I find this difficult to put on over my mask, & it isn't all that comfortable to wear. However, I do think it keeps my mouth closed better than the neck pillow does, which is the opposite of what I first said. The neck pillow seems to have folded down after wearing it a few times, so the chin strap is actually somewhat better.
customer_reviews.author: Esmerelda

customer_reviews.title: Makes sleep apnea worse
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for a good chin strap for nasal cpap use to keep my mouth shut. This is huge. I don't know anyone with a head this big. I could adjust it so it's tight enough, and it felt comfortable. However, for me because of the width, it caused more apnea episodes. I think it's because of the width. It covers the chin all the way to my neck under my jaw. I think it pushes on my throat causing more blockage.
customer_reviews.author: Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and adjust for comfort
customer_reviews.text: This chin strap works for me. The single strap that goes behind my head keeps the strap in place and the velcro allows me to adjust the tightness. This strap tightens enough to keep my mouth closed while I sleep without being painful.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell H. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: the xtra strap that goes around the back of your head is horriable
customer_reviews.text: the xtra strap that goes around the back of your head is horrible because it is not part of the chin strap itself therefor it does not stay in place the way it should.
customer_reviews.author: Hak2005

customer_reviews.title: Effective and comfortable chin strap
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many straps and lip tape for use with my CPAP. This is the best strap for effectiveness and comfort IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: ballpounder1

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t last that long. Need a new one every 2-3 months works great at first than they stretch out. Also a bit to wide.
customer_reviews.author: Inkqbus

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time last night. I used it in conjunction with my CPAP mask. Worked fantastic and is very comfortable, much more so than any other that I have tried. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & effective chin strap!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely comfortable and very effective chin strap once you get it assembled correctly to fit your head. I have a larger head and you can get it set just right in about 5 minutes. I HIGHLY recommend it since it is soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: TLTrue

customer_reviews.title: Works and is cheaper than what I was buying....
customer_reviews.text: from a CPAP supply store. Seems almost identical to what they were selling for $8 more. Saw some complaints about being too tight/small? I have a big head and don't have that problem. I have purchased another since first trying it (velcro straps tend to rip the material after a month or so of use - other more expensive model did the same thing) and will continue to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: zoltar_speaks

customer_reviews.title: for covering ears when sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really order this for the chin strap. I ordered it because I like my ears covered when I sleep. It works really well but can be a little annoying after a while.
customer_reviews.author: TimeTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Just dandy
customer_reviews.text: I don't snore, but I do a lot of loud mouth breathing and I wanted something to stop me from waking up with a dry mouth. This strap has been very comfortable and holds my jaw lightly closed. My only complaint is that I wish it were slightly longer. It just fits together with velcro and you adjust to your head size. Now maybe I've just got a huge melon, but I have to adjust it so that the velcro just barely overlaps, like 1/8 on a inch, so that it doesn't feel too tight on me.
customer_reviews.author: Rybegooch

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My problem was with my CPAP with the pressure sometimes my mouth would open slightly to release the pressure. This strap has a strap that goes around the back of your head. This enables you to move the strap forward in front of your ears without it slipping off. Then I put my CPAP head gear with the nose pillow on. Keep my mouth closed. Since it is adjustable as it stretches I can readjust it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for CPAP....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for those using a CPAP machine. Comfortable and fully adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Canashar

customer_reviews.title: It's a little too big
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I got, but it seems made for a larger head than the last one. It works well, though, and definitely helps when I use the CPAP machine. It would be nice if they would make one with quieter velcro -- I wake my husband when I adjust it in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Stuart

customer_reviews.title: works fine.  I just need a stronger device.
customer_reviews.text: worked ok. Not as strong as the "deluxe" chin strap I get at the local medical supply store. I am a big guy who likes to mouth breath so I will stick with the heavy duty "deluxe" chin strap. If however it is too strong for you, this might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: dwzkd

customer_reviews.title: Was comfortable the first night
customer_reviews.text: Was comfortable the first night, second night it was unbearable at the same adjusted size. My husband says it does not work AT ALL. Would not recommend. Also made me very hot!
customer_reviews.author: Krista K. Bracy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it covering ears and it makes my neck itch.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not the snore proof item I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The price was okay, the concept is great but it makes my face itch and It falls out of place too easily. I was not overly impressed with the performance and didn't stop my snoring if I slept on my stomach or side.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well.
customer_reviews.text: It was as designed but it's tricky to to keep in place on my full head of hair without tightening it to much to squeeze my brain housing group.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Barry

customer_reviews.title: TOO WIDE!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, but gave me an ear ache every night. If not ight enough it doesn't work.Too tight hurts my ear!
customer_reviews.author: I hate when people lie!

customer_reviews.title: It is as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made and performs as expected. Only time will tell if the stretch will last. I bought one for myself and one for my wife. It seems to have reduced the volume of her snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would work better
customer_reviews.text: I use a Cpap machine at night and thought this would help when I lay on my side to keep my jaw from hurting when it relaxes. I didn't have as much success as I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: CAH

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and I would order it again. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and I would order it again. I find that the piece that goes around the head is starting to stretch out letting my mouth open.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Waagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best ever strap although it tends to be a bit too long.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Still way better than the others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Works, but slips up during the night. Still way better than the others I have tried!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Stinson

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while i use my cpap machine. feels tight when i wear it but i was told i still snore and wake up feeling like i didn't sleep at all. I gave it many chances but each time i wake up and my throat is sore
customer_reviews.author: jerry P

customer_reviews.title: Legend "Snore Stop Strap" does NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.text: The item is shipped with NO INSTRUCTIONS and comes off during the night. It does not prevent nighttime mouth breathing and the result is a dry tongue and mouth in the morning. The combination results in an assessment that it is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle John

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to help my husband's snoring, and it did nothing. His snoring still kept me up at night.
customer_reviews.author: DMGuss

customer_reviews.title: Snore Stop Strap should have advise on the intended method of use.
customer_reviews.text: It was too tight, with no adjustment. There were no guidelines as to what to do with the straps that accompanied the snore stop strap.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product thatI works for CPAP users!
customer_reviews.text: I have nasal pillow CPAP. This type of CPAP is only effective it the mouth is kept closed. This strap keeps my mouth tightly yet comfortably close. Finally a product that works. I am going to purchase a second one to keep as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, keeps mouth closed, fully adjustable. Price was very good. Would not hesitate to buy another one Ver happy
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bishop

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the legend medical snore stop strap, adjustable deluxe chin strap white. by Legend MD . I received the Super Deluxe Chin Strap (AA-08) from Avalon Aire. I don't know if there is any difference between the Legend Medical snore strap and the Avalon Aire Super Deluxe chin strap. I do know that the strap I received is a few inches shorter than my respironics strap. The few inches makes a difference for me.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: sizing runs a little small, but will definitely keep your mouth shut. I could not get the headstrap to fit correctly (to short). Using for CPAP so I cannot give opinion on the snore stopping ability
customer_reviews.author: Dadgumit

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A bit too tight for my head which makes it uncomfortable for me to sleep with. Better with a longer strap.
customer_reviews.author: Meerm

customer_reviews.title: joke
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. Uncomfortable and bulky. Doesn't stop snoring at all. Now used as a bungee cord or strap.
customer_reviews.author: John E Martin

customer_reviews.title: Legend medical chin strap
customer_reviews.text: This is our second order of the Legend Medical Snore Stop band. It washes up great and lasts a long time. We finally decided to replace his old one bc it was looking shabby and the velcro no longer stuck. My husband likes the way this one fits and it doesn't get in the way of his cpap machine at all. I've researched all the many different kinds of these bands and still found this one to be superior in quality, wearability, and cost. It arrived quickly and was packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyH

product_meta.title: Legend Medical- Snore Stop Strap-Adjustable Delux Chin Strap
product_meta.description: This is the premium adjustable chin strap from Legend Medical Devices, Inc. The strap is designed to minimize the memory touch.If you buy from the other suppliers for the wrong brands, you shall report to Amazon for full refund.
feature_bullets: Adjustable Chin Strap, Extra bandage included.
visit our store for all size chin strap

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
